body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
[kaig1@login1 spock-gpu]$ spack install pfunit
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "pfunit@4.1.14%gcc@10.3.0~docs~ipo~mpi~openmp+shared~use_comm_world build_type=RelWithDebInfo max_array_rank=5 arch=cray-sles15-zen2/rn5zxxi"
List of matching conflicts for spec:

    pfunit@4.1.14%gcc@10.3.0~docs~ipo~mpi~openmp+shared~use_comm_world build_type=RelWithDebInfo max_array_rank=5 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
        ^cmake@3.21.2%gcc@10.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                ^pkgconf@1.8.0%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^openssl@1.1.1l%gcc@10.3.0~docs+systemcerts arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                ^perl@5.34.0%gcc@10.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.3.0+cxx~docs+stl patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.3.0~debug~pic+shared arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                        ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.3.0 libs=shared,static arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                        ^readline@8.1%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=cray-sles15-zen2
        ^m4@1.4.19%gcc@10.3.0+sigsegv arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^libsigsegv@2.13%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
        ^python@3.8.11%gcc@10.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87,ebdca648c9c1d25f586d7e2a495b62e6d91973b55264a13d89eda1beff72ef56 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^expat@2.4.1%gcc@10.3.0+libbsd arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                ^libbsd@0.11.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^libmd@1.0.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                ^libxml2@2.9.12%gcc@10.3.0~python arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                    ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.3.0~pic libs=shared,static arch=cray-sles15-zen2
                ^tar@1.34%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.3.0 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^sqlite@3.35.5%gcc@10.3.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=cray-sles15-zen2
            ^util-linux-uuid@2.36.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=cray-sles15-zen2

1. "+shared" conflicts with "pfunit@4.0.0:"
```

### Error message

I believe the above shows the problem, so I don't think it helps to add 1744 lines of additional debug info, though I'll be happy to add it if requested.

### Information on your system

[kaig1@login1 spack]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-4066-4f3a538519
* **Python:** 3.6.13
* **Platform:** cray-sles15-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original

(It's current `develop`, even though that's not that obvious from the `0.16.2`.)

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: installation issue: pfunit
